name: Private tender package
highlight_answers:
{"category": "Administrative Questions", "subcategory": "Eligibility & Compliance", "question": "What are the documents required to be submitted before submission deadline? List all of them and indicate how to prepare these docs.", "answer": "**Documents that must be submitted before the submission deadline**

| # | Document (or envelope) | How to prepare it |
|---|------------------------|-------------------|
| 1 | **Power of Attorney (PoA)** – a written PoA signed by an authorised representative of the consultant, authorising that person to sign the proposal. | Draft a PoA in the required format, sign it, and attach it to the Technical Proposal. All pages of the PoA must be initialed. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 2 | **TECH‑1 – Technical Proposal Submission Form** | Complete the standard form exactly as shown in the RFP, initial every page, and sign the form. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 3 | **TECH‑2 – Consultant’s Organization and Experience** | Fill out the standard form with details of the consultant’s organisation and past experience, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 4 | **TECH‑3 – Comments and Suggestions on Terms of Reference, Counterpart Staff, and Facilities to be Provided by Client** | Complete the standard form, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 5 | **TECH‑4 – Description of Approach, Methodology, and Work Plan** | Draft the work plan and methodology in the standard format, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 6 | **TECH‑5 – Work Schedule and Planning for Deliverables** | Prepare the schedule in the standard form, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 7 | **TECH‑6 – Team Composition, Assignment, and Key Experts’ Time Input; and CV Form** | Complete the team composition and CVs in the standard format, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 8 | **FIN‑1 – Financial Proposal Submission Form** | Fill out the standard financial form, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
| 9 | **FIN‑2 – Summary of Costs** | Prepare a cost summary in the standard format, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
|10 | **FIN‑3 – Breakdown of Remuneration** (incl. Appendix A “Financial Negotiations – Breakdown of Remuneration Rates” for QBS) | Draft the remuneration breakdown in the standard format, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
|11 | **FIN‑4 – Reimbursable Expenses** | Complete the reimbursable‑expenses form in the standard format, initial all pages, and sign. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
|12 | **Statement of Undertaking** (if required by the Data Sheet) | Prepare a statement in local currency, sign it, and attach it to the proposal. The Statement of Undertaking is required per the Data Sheet. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:25] |
|13 | **Inner envelope for the Technical Proposal** | Place the PoA and TECH‑1 – TECH‑6 inside a sealed inner envelope marked “TECHNICAL PROPOSAL”, and include the consultant’s name and address. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:17] |
|14 | **Inner envelope for the Financial Proposal** (if applicable) | Place FIN‑1 – FIN‑4 and the Statement of Undertaking inside a sealed inner envelope marked “FINANCIAL PROPOSAL”, and include the consultant’s name and address. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:17] |
|15 | **Outer envelope** | Place the sealed inner envelopes inside a single outer envelope, seal it, and affix the submission address, RFP reference number, assignment name, consultant’s name and address. Mark the outer envelope “DO NOT OPEN BEFORE [deadline]”. [RFP_Nurek.pdf, p:17] |

**Key preparation steps for all documents**

1. **Use the standard forms** listed in Clause 10 (TECH‑1 – TECH‑6, FIN‑1 – FIN‑4, Statement of Undertaking).  
2. **Initial every page** of each form and sign the required documents (PoA, Statement of Undertaking, etc.).  
3. **Attach the PoA** to the Technical Proposal and sign the original submission letters.  
4. **Seal each inner envelope** (Technical and Financial) and label them clearly.  
5. **Place the sealed inner envelopes in the outer envelope**, seal it, and mark it “DO NOT OPEN BEFORE [deadline]”.  
6. **Send the outer envelope** to the address specified in the Data Sheet no later than the submission deadline.  

These documents and packaging steps constitute the complete set of items that must be submitted before the submission deadline.", "references": [{"chunk_id": 29, "file_name": "RFP_Nurek.pdf", "page": 25, "bbox": [0.34375, 0.2526455026455027, 0.9558823529411764, 0.5674603174603174], "snippet": "Request for Proposals — 10.1
The Proposal shall comprise the following: — For FULL TECHNICAL PROPOSAL (FTP): 1st Inner Envelope with the Technical Proposal:
(1) Power of Attorney to sign the Proposal
(2) TECH-1
(3) TECH-2
(4) TECH-3
(5) TECH-4
(6) TECH-5
(7) TECH-6 AND 2d Inner Envelope with the Financial Proposal (if applicable):
(1) FIN-1
(2) FIN-2
(3) FIN-3
(4) FIN-4
(5) Statement of Undertaking (if required under Data Sheet 10.2 below)", "score": null, "source_collection": "tender_default-tenant_db965721-946f-4032-aaeb-a7adb374", "source_tool": null, "orig_size": [544.0, 756.0], "tender_id": "db965721-946f-4032-aaeb-a7adb374a78e"}, {"chunk_id": 29, "file_name": "RFP_Nurek.pdf", "page": 25, "bbox": [0.34375, 0.2526455026455027, 0.9558823529411764, 0.5674603174603174], "snippet": "Request for Proposals — 10.1

Submission, Opening and Evaluation 17.
Submission,
Sealing, and
Marking of
Proposals 17.1
The Consultant shall submit a signed and complete
Proposal comprising the documents and forms in accordance
with Clause 10 (Documents Comprising Proposal). The
submission can be done by mail or by hand. If specified in the
Data Sheet, the Consultant has the option of submitting its
Proposals electronically. 17.2
An authorized representative of the Consultant shall
sign the original submission letters in the required format for
both the Technical Proposal and, if applicable, the Financial
Proposal and shall initial all pages of both. The authorization
shall be in the form of a written power of attorney attached to
the Technical Proposal. 17.2.1
A Proposal submitted by a Joint Venture shall be
signed by all members so as to be legally binding on all
members, or by an authorized representative who has a
written power of attorney signed by each member’s
authorized representative. 17.3
Any modifications, revisions, interlineations, erasures,
or overwriting shall be valid only if they are signed or initialed
by the person signing the Proposal. 17.4
The signed Proposal shall be marked “ORIGINAL”, and
its copies marked “COPY” as appropriate. The number of copies
is indicated in the Data Sheet. All copies shall be made from
the signed original. If there are discrepancies between the
original and the copies, the original shall prevail. 17.5
The original and all the copies of the Technical Proposal
shall be placed inside of a sealed envelope clearly marked
“TECHNICAL PROPOSAL”, “[Name of the Assignment]“,
reference number, name and address of the Consultant, and
with a warning “DO NOT OPEN UNTIL [INSERT THE DATE AND
THE TIME OF THE TECHNICAL PROPOSAL SUBMISSION
DEADLINE].” 17.6
Similarly, the original Financial Proposal (if required
for the applicable selection method) shall be placed inside of a
sealed envelope clearly marked “FINANCIAL PROPOSAL”
followed by the name of the assignment, reference number,
name and address of the Consultant, and with a warning “DO
NOT OPEN WITH THE TECHNICAL PROPOSAL.”", "score": null, "source_collection": "tender_default-tenant_db965721-946f-4032-aaeb-a7adb374", "source_tool": null, "orig_size": [544.0, 756.0], "tender_id": "db965721-946f-4032-aaeb-a7adb374a78e"}, {"chunk_id": 19, "file_name": "RFP_Nurek.pdf", "page": 17, "bbox": [0.17463235294117646, 0.1283068783068783, 0.9650735294117648, 0.917989417989418], "snippet": "Request for Proposals — C. project_card_fields.Project Scope:
Phase: Detailed design and engineering, tender and bid preparation, construction supervision and contract administration  
Scope: Detailed design and construction planning for power plant rehabilitation, dam safety civil works, spillway gate rehabilitation, and switchyard equipment rehabilitation; preparation of tender documents; technical support for bid evaluation and contract award; construction supervision for units 7, 8, and 9, dam safety measures, and switchyard rehabilitation; support during defects liability period; and potential extension for rehabilitation of remaining six units.
project_card_fields.location: Asia, Republic of Tajikistan, Nurek, Nurek Hydroelectric Power Plant
project_card_fields.weighting:
Yes, the weighting system for price vs. quality is:  
Technical (T) = 85, Financial (P) = 15
